item.title: I am a Software developer
item.description: My name is Marvin Mokua Junior, I’m a fullstack developer into web and mobile I’m proficient in JavaScript TypeScript Java Dart & Flutter Go JAM Stack, SSR … Marvin ðŸ¥° Open Source In my free time I have discussions on software deficiencies in the market, promote projects that have small voices, and build some projects from scratch myself I use Arch BTW More about me I’m a free thinker, open to new experiences and I try to look at things in perspective.
item.content:
My name is Marvin Mokua Junior, I’m a fullstack developer into web and mobile

I’m proficient in

  • JavaScript
  • TypeScript
  • Java
  • Dart & Flutter
  • Go
  • JAM Stack, SSR …

Marvin ðŸ¥° Open Source

In my free time I have discussions on software deficiencies in the market, promote projects that have small voices, and build some projects from scratch myself

I use Arch BTW

More about me

I’m a free thinker, open to new experiences and I try to look at things in perspective.
